coo_ modify shapes

coo.Rmd
library(Momocs2)

** ONLY SERVES AS NOTEBOOK FOR NOW **

Scope

coo_ tribe changes shapes in some way. For example:

  • coo_center change shape centroid (and all coordinates) position, ie translate shape
  • coo_scale : change distances from all points to centroid, ie resize shape
  • coo_sample : change shape number of coordinates

Implementation

For each coo_foo function :

  • coo_foo.default implements the modification
  • coo_foo.list allows is use on coo_list with purrr::map*
  • coo_foo.coo_tbl allows its use on coo_tbl and to specify from and to columns, using tidyevaluation

Developed by Vincent Bonhomme, Julien Claude.

Site built with pkgdown 1.5.1.
